title: Discussion Section with Kevin Murphy and José Scheinkman
description: In this episode, Murphy and José Scheinkman, a former UChicago faculty member and department chair now at Columbia University and Princeton University, elaborate on the experience of being an economist at the University of Chicago, evaluate recent trends in the global economy, and highlight ways in which economic thinking can more broadly be applied to a wide range of problems and solutions.
itunes:author: Becker Friedman Institute at UChicago
